title: Megan Barton-Hanson shares cryptic post after 'split' from girlfriend Chelcee Grimes
text:

Megan Barton-Hanson has reportedly split from her girlfriend Chelcee Grimes, and has been making subtle digs about the breakup on social media.

The Love Island star, 25, and her singer ex, 27, couldn't make time to see each other, it's claimed.

But Megan took to her Instagram stories to suggest that the end of their relationship wasn't as amicable as it first appeared.

She shared a quote that said: "Reminder: Relationships are supposed to make you feel good."

Hours after Megan made the cryptic post, Chelcee shared a quote on her own Instagram that hinted about her side of the split.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She shared lines from a poem called Irrelevant Now by author Arch Hades, with the lyrics reading: "Instead of standing by my side You tricked me into conceding.

"Into dimming my own light, Feeling guilty got succeeding."

The pair got together after Megan enjoyed a brief fling with Celebs Go Dating co-star Demi Sims.

(Image: Channel 4)

Demi later said they "stabbed her in the back" by getting together.

Megan and Chelcee are said to be on good terms after calling it a day.

A source told The Sun: "They got on really well and enjoyed a brief romance, but decided to call it a day earlier this week.

(Image: Chelcee Grimes/Instagram)

"Both were a bit upset about it, but remain pals.

"Chelcee is throwing herself into her music projects and concentrating on recording new tracks at the moment.

"She is working on a music video so that is taking her mind off her love life."
